Include attempted solutions, why they didn't work, and the expected results. See also: Stack Overflow question checklistClosed 9 years ago.                        Improve this question                    For this string, 16.82080560, 96.13055810 I want to get"String one = 16.82080560"and"String two = 96.13055810"in android.Admin that I suck in string manipulation and regex.Please let me know how can I get such two value from a string.
Please using this api: StringTokenizer.nextToken.
